name: equtr2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))

stmt.origin: imp(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
stmt.pretty: imp(s0 = s1, s2 = s1, s0 = s2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))

comment: Equality is a left-Euclidean binary relation. Uncurried (imported) form of ~ equeucl . (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 11-Apr-2021.)
